main_pass.tooltip: Pixel format. yuv420p is 8-bit, p010le is 10-bit.

bitrate.tooltip: Target video bitrate. Higher values = better quality but larger files.

megabit.tooltip: If true, bitrate is in megabits/sec. If false, bitrate is in kilobits/sec.

save_metadata.tooltip: Embed workflow metadata (prompt, workflow JSON) into the video file.
